sql.if: and ( object_name like #{qryCond} or obj_chn_name like #{qryCond} )

mapper.select:
SELECT * from t_olk_object where 1=1
order by norder ${pageInfo}
SELECT count(*) cnt from t_olk_object where 1=1

sql.if: and ( ( a.share_flag = 2 and a.id in ( select data_id from t_olk_data_node where node_id = #{ownerNodeId} ) ) or ( a.share_flag =1) or ( a.share_flag = 0 and a.user_id = #{ownerUserId} ) )

mapper.select:
SELECT a.*,'odb' scatalog ,case when a.share_flag = 1 or data_id is not null or a.user_id =#{ownerUserId} then 1 else 0 end userObjPriv ,c.db_name ,c.dbsource_id ,c.db_chn_name ,c.schema_name ,c.schema_chn_name ,node_party_name from t_olk_object a inner join ( select bs.id scid, db.db_name ,db.dbsource_id ,db.db_chn_name ,bs.schema_name ,bs.schema_chn_name from t_olk_database db, t_olk_schema bs where db.id = bs.db_id ) c on a.schema_id = c.scid left join (select id nodeId,name node_party_name from fl_node_party) b on a.node_party_id = b.nodeId left join ( select data_id from fl_data_approve where approve = 1 and creator_id =#{ownerUserId} ) n on a.id = n.data_id where a.enable =1
order by created_time desc ${pageInfo}

SELECT count(*) cnt from t_olk_object a inner join ( select bs.id scid, db.db_name ,db.dbsource_id ,db.db_chn_name ,bs.schema_name ,bs.schema_chn_name from t_olk_database db, t_olk_schema bs where db.id = bs.db_id ) c on a.schema_id = c.scid left join (select id nodeId,name node_party_name from fl_node_party) b on a.node_party_id = b.nodeId left join ( select data_id from fl_data_approve where approve = 1 and creator_id =#{ownerUserId} ) n on a.id = n.data_id where a.enable =1

SELECT a.* from t_olk_object a inner join ( select bs.id scid, db.db_name ,db.dbsource_id ,db.db_chn_name ,bs.schema_name ,bs.schema_chn_name from t_olk_database db, t_olk_schema bs where db.id = bs.db_id ) c on a.schema_id = c.scid left join (select id nodeId,name node_party_name from fl_node_party) b on a.node_party_id = b.nodeId inner join ( select data_id from fl_data_approve where approve = 1 and creator_id =#{grantUserId} ) n on a.id = n.data_id where a.enable =1
order by created_time desc ${pageInfo}
